It's a good video, but it feels as if too much is being glossed over. The salt doesn't cover everything (why?), the paste doesn't either (despite what the narrator says), the final product looks as if it was further processed (i.e. the "rind" is being removed. Which has been black and (I think?) moldy).

It gives a nice overview, and it's quite interesting (and relaxing :-) but I think it would be much better with a bit more information. Have additional information shown as text, for example. A few words one can read while listening that explain finer points.
